title: AI Persuasion Followup Survey
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott requests participants who took the AI persuasion experiment survey to complete a follow-up survey.
- The follow-up survey is short and does not require any reading.
- Only those who took the AI persuasion experiment survey should complete the follow-up survey.

Key learnings
- Scott values feedback and follow-up surveys as a means of improving future experiments.
- The follow-up survey is an easy way to gauge the effectiveness of the AI persuasion experiment.

Key questions
- Who should complete the follow-up survey?
- What kind of feedback can be gained from the follow-up survey?
- How can feedback from the follow-up survey be used to improve future experiments?
